projects.name: Crypto Portfolio
projects.desc: A Java-based web application with metadata fetched from the Last.fm APIs and processed using the multithreaded approach
highlights: Designed and built a web-based cryptocurrency management social app worked in a team of 5 people. (CryptoCompared API)
Developed backend services using RESTful API with comprehensive documentation and successfully deployed onto AWS EC2. (Node.js, Express, React, Postgresql, AWS, Nginx, Markdown, JWT, Nodemailer.js)
Implemented a user-based investment recommendation system based on users’ current investment. (Raccoon.js, Redis)

projects.name: CandyFM
highlights: Built a Java-based web application with metadata fetched from the Last.fm APIs and processed using the multithreaded approach (Java concurrency), 3 times faster than a single thread.
Used MVC pattern and Java Jetty/Servlets to build the web app and used Travis-ci and JUnit for testing.

Application features include but not limited: recommend similar songs by title, tags, or artist names, authentication, authorization, search history, popular searches, favorite songs, and partial search.

projects.name: AleperyChat
projects.desc: Online video chat Android app using Opentok and using Affectiva detect and evaluate users’ facial expression
highlights: Implemented an online video chat Android app using Opentok and using Affectiva detect and evaluate users’ facial expression.
Used Firebase for user’s facial expression data storage and smoothed the user facial expression value by sliding windows.
Implemented Collaborative Filtering algorithm to compute user and dating partner’s real-time facial synchronization level to assess the affections of a chat.

projects.name: Real-Time News Web App
projects.desc: A real-time news scraping data pipeline which has news monitoring, scraping and deduping servic
highlights: Implemented a real-time news scraping data pipeline which has news monitoring, scraping and deduping services. (Python, News API)
Used RabbitMQ to connect different services, TF-IDF for deduping news, MongoDB for data storage and Node.js for news display.
